Class AccountingLineGroupTag

java.lang.Object

      org.kuali.kfs.sys.document.web.AccountingLineGroupTag
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
public class AccountingLineGroupTag
extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport

Tag that is responsible for rendering an accounting line group

generateItemPropertyFromCollectionNameTheDumbWay

protected String generateItemPropertyFromCollectionNameTheDumbWay(String collectionName)
Automagically generates teh name of the collection item property from the collection property by taking any extra "s" off the end. Note: I never claimed this method was smart. You'd be surprised at how often it'll work, though.

Parameters:
collectionName - the collection name to generate the collection item name from
Returns:
the collection item property name

public int doEndTag()
             throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException

getRenderableElementsForLine

protected List<AccountingLineTableRow> getRenderableElementsForLine(AccountingLineGroupDefinition groupDefinition,
                                                                    AccountingLine accountingLine,
                                                                    boolean newLine,
                                                                    boolean topLine,
                                                                    String accountingLinePropertyName)
Creates a List of renderable elements, with all rendering transformations accomplished, to be rendered

Parameters:
groupDefinition - the data dictionary definition of the accounting line group this line is in
accountingLine - the accounting line itself
newLine - true if the line is new and not added yet to the document, false otherwise
Returns:
a List of AccountingLineTableRows to render

removeTopRowIfNecessary

protected void removeTopRowIfNecessary(AccountingLineGroupDefinition definition,
                                       boolean topLine,
                                       List<AccountingLineTableRow> rows)
If it is determined that removing the first row (presumably a header row) is necessary, removes it

Parameters:
rows - the rows to possibly remove the top row from

safelyRemoveTopRow

protected void safelyRemoveTopRow(List<AccountingLineTableRow> rows)
Looks through the top row. If there's any fields in the top row, it quietly fails; it also won't remove the top row if that's the only row there is

Parameters:
rows - the List of rows to remove the top one of if possible

getNewAccountingLine

protected AccountingLine getNewAccountingLine()
Returns:
the new accounting line from the form

getAccountingLineCollection

protected List<AccountingLine> getAccountingLineCollection()
Returns:
the collection of accounting lines that this tag is supposed to render

generateContainersForAllLines

protected List<RenderableAccountingLineContainer> generateContainersForAllLines()
Returns:
a List of accounting line table rows to be rendered for all the accounting lines available for rendering within the group

isErrorMapContainingErrorsOnLine

protected boolean isErrorMapContainingErrorsOnLine(String accountingLinePropertyName)
Determines if the error map contains any errors which exist on the currently rendered accounting line

Parameters:
accountingLinePropertyName - the property name of the accounting line
Returns:
true if there are errors on the line, false otherwise

buildContainerForLine

protected RenderableAccountingLineContainer buildContainerForLine(AccountingLineGroupDefinition groupDefinition,
                                                                  AccountingDocument accountingDocument,
                                                                  AccountingLine accountingLine,
                                                                  org.kuali.rice.kim.bo.Person currentUser,
                                                                  Integer count,
                                                                  boolean topLine)
Builds an accounting line container for a given accounting line to render

Parameters:
groupDefinition - the data dictionary definition of the group this line is a part of
accountingDocument - the accounting document the line is or will someday live on
accountingLine - the accounting line to render
currentUser - the currently logged in user
count - the count of this line within the collection represented by the group; null if this is a new line for the group
Returns:
the container created
